definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Unweighted indices are simple arithmetic or geometric averages.
sentences.chinese: 不加權的指數指簡單算術平均或幾何平均數。
